meanings.sent1: The rock promines from the cliff.
meanings.sent2: The tree promines above the rest of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to climb the promine rock but slipped comically.
meanings.sent4: Her determination promines like a beacon in the darkness of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse promines against the stormy sea, guiding ships to safety.

meanings.sent1: The tall tower is a promine in the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: Her bright smile is the promine of her face.
meanings.sent3: The promine of the cake was the giant cherry on top.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills are a promine in the team.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood as a majestic promine in the distance.
